1.15.4¶

General¶

Enhancements¶

  • Core & Internals: rucio-judge-cleaner traceback against postgres #722
  • Core & Internals: Keyword parameters should always be used for instansiating datetime.timedelta #807
  • Documentation: Add external link for ActiveMQ for people joining the project #1001
  • Documentation: Typographical Review of Documentation Files #985
  • Release management: Add python3 in the rucio dev docker image #973

Clients¶

Enhancements¶

  • Clients: section policy/support/rucio_support missing in rucio.cfg template and tests #976

Bugs¶

  • Clients: Error with python3: the JSON object must be str, not ‘bytes’ #964
  • Clients: Client AttributeError when the server returns nothing #965
  • Release management: setup_clients.py classifiers needs to be a list, not tuples #949
